input.sentences: the temple was built in the traditional japanese architectural design .
hundreds of people went there daily .
inside were beautiful statutes of buddha .
my friend [male] was excited to go inside .
so were my other two friends .
output.sentences: cherry blossoms are seen in front of a large Japanese building.
A group of people start to walk towards the large building.
A Buddah Statue is there with one hand held up.
a man leans forward and waves at the camera.
A couple stands together and looks forward to take a picture.
